# r.spatial.workshop.datasets

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The `r.spatial.workshop.datasets` package is a data pacakge. Its datasets are mostly used internally in the lecture slides in the [R-as-GIS-workshop](https://github.com/tmieno2/R-as-GIS-workshop) repository.
